00081 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00082 //
00083 // CLASS: uvm_creator
00084 //
00085 // Provides the interface used for registering proxy classes with the
00086 // factory which is necessary for creating such proxy classes from 
00087 // the factory.
00088 // The two different kinds of classes that are supported by the factory
00089 // are uvm_component and uvm_object.
00090 //
00091 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00092 
00098 class uvm_creator {
00099 public:
00100   virtual ~uvm_creator();
00101   virtual void *                 create_class(const std::string& name = "") = 0;
00102   virtual uvm_object_creator*    as_object_creator();
00103   virtual uvm_component_creator* as_component_creator();
00104 protected:
00105   uvm_creator();
00106 };
00107 
00108 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00109 //
00110 // CLASS: uvm_object_creator
00111 //
00112 // Implements the interface used by the factory to create an uvm_object.
00113 // Derives from uvm_creator.
00114 // Usually, the UVM_OBJECT_UTILS macro in an uvm_object defines the
00115 // corresponding uvm_object_creator class. 
00116 //
00117 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00118 
00124 class uvm_object_creator : public uvm_creator {
00125 public:
00126   uvm_object_creator();
00127   virtual uvm_object* create(
00128     const std::string& name = ""
00129   ) = 0;
00130   virtual void * create_class(const std::string& name = "") { return create(name); }
00131   virtual ~uvm_object_creator();
00132   virtual uvm_object_creator* as_object_creator();
00133 };
00134 
00135 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00136 //
00137 // CLASS: uvm_component_creator
00138 //
00139 // Implements the interface used by the factory to create an uvm_component.
00140 // Derives from uvm_creator.
00141 // Usually, the UVM_COMPONENT_UTILS macro in an uvm_object defines the
00142 // corresponding uvm_component_creator class. 
00143 //
00144 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00145 
00151 class uvm_component_creator : public uvm_creator {
00152 public:
00153   uvm_component_creator();
00154   virtual uvm_component* create(
00155     const std::string& name = ""
00156   ) = 0;
00157   virtual void * create_class(const std::string& name = "") { return create(name); }
00158   virtual ~uvm_component_creator();
00159   virtual uvm_component_creator* as_component_creator();
00160 };
00161 
00163 
00164 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00165 //
00166 // CLASS: uvm_factory
00167 //
00168 // Class for creating uvm_objects and uvm_components. 
00169 // Before creation, the factory processes any overrides, if applicable. 
00170 // Class types  have to be registered with the factory using the 
00171 // uvm_creator class.
00172 // A singleton factory instance is created for a given simulation run.
00173 //
00174 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00175 
00181 class uvm_factory {
00182 public:
00183 
00184   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00185   // Register an object or a component with the factory. 
00186   //
00187   // Usually, the UVM_OBJECT_REGISTER and UVM_COMPONENT_REGISTER macros 
00188   // will invoke these factory member methods to register a particular 
00189   // object or component with the factory.
00190   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00191 
00192   static int register_class_creator(
00193     const std::string & type_name, 
00194     uvm_creator* creator
00195   );
00196   static int register_uvm_object_creator(
00197     const std::string & type_name, 
00198     uvm_object_creator* creator
00199   );
00200   static int register_component_creator(
00201     const std::string & type_name, 
00202     uvm_component_creator* creator
00203   );
00204   
00205   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00206   // Create an uvm_object or an uvm_component through the factory.
00207   //
00208   // Overrides are applied before creation.
00209   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00210 
00211   static uvm_object* create_uvm_object(
00212     std::string type_name,
00213     std::string inst_path = "",
00214     std::string name = "",
00215     bool no_overrides = false
00216   );
00217   static uvm_component* create_component(
00218     std::string type_name,
00219     std::string inst_path = "",
00220     std::string name = ""
00221   );
00222   static void* create_registered_class(
00223     const std::string & type_name
00224   );
00225 
00226   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00227   // Set up type overrides or instance overrides through the factory.
00228   //
00229   // Wildcards('*' and '?') are allowed in "inst_path" of instance overrides.
00230   // Instance overrides have precedence over type overrides.
00231   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00232 
00233   static void set_type_override(
00234     std::string orignal_type_name,
00235     std::string replacement_type_name,
00236     bool replace = true
00237   );
00238   static void set_inst_override(
00239     std::string inst_path,
00240     std::string orignal_type_name,
00241     std::string replacement_type_name
00242   );
00243 
00244   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00245   // Print all overrides in the factory.
00246   //
00247   // Useful for debugging purposes.
00248   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00249 
00250   static void print_all_overrides(); // for debugging use
00251 
00252   // methods primarily for internal use
00253 
00254   static std::string get_type_override(
00255     std::string orignal_type_name
00256   );
00257   static std::string get_inst_override(
00258     std::string inst_path,
00259     std::string orignal_type_name
00260   );
00261   //
00262   static bool is_component_registered(const std::string & type_name);
00263   static bool is_uvm_object_registered(const std::string & type_name);
00264   static bool is_class_registered(const std::string & type_name);
00265 protected:
00266   static uvm_factory_rep* m_rep; // internal implementation class
00267 };
00268 
00269 
00270 template <typename T>
00271 std::string gen_type_name()
00272 {
00273    return typeid(T).name();
00274 }
